content:
Hey folks, I've been looking into this issue https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/10472 and I'm reaching out to figure out how (if at all) it should be done on client side. So far, I came up with following (please note my understanding of the project is still superficial):

  1. Showing it as a new option (find all usages) under the right click menu on trait declaration: Screenshot-from-2021-11-07-20-29-13.png. To my understanding, this would require lsp extension so it doesn't seem like a viable option.
  2. Adding it in annotation - for trait declaration we could add <y> implementations | <x> usages (natually, usages would be clickable and show the list of usages for all trait methods)
    Hope my proposals make sense. Looking forward to discussing this with you all :)
